pasta:
Why is six afraid of seven? 

Six hasn't been the same since he left Vietnam. Every time he closes his eyes, he's sees Charlie hiding in the darkness of the forest. Not that you could ever see those bastards, mind you. They were fast and they knew their way around the jungle. He remembers the looks on the boy's faces when they walked into that village and... oh Jesus. He shouldn't think about that now. Sometimes he still hears Tex's slow southern drawl. He remembers the smell of Brooklyn's cigarettes. He always had a pack of Luckys. But the boys are gone now... he knows that. It's--it's just that he forgets sometimes. And sometimes the way that seven looks at him... it makes him think. Sets him on edge. And he feels like he's back there... In the jungle... In the darkness. 

Seven has a hook for a hand as well, which is very scary.

The fitnessgram PACER test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 metre PACER test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly but gets faster every minute you hear this signal *blaloop*. A single lap should be completed each time you hear this sound *ding*. Remember to run in a straight line and run as long as possible untill the test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark *bloop*, get ready *bloop bloop*, Start *baloop*

Dude, coming at you from a point of genuine concern, you should really wait until your brain has finished developing before doing cannabis. Once its fully developed and you don't have to worry about impaired development, have at it. I know I'm not going to sway any opinions, and this is probably an unpopular opinion here, but there is a legitimate reason to wait until you're in your 20's.

That's what you want out of life? Cooked breakfast, perhaps a feminine wife, and children who respect you? In exchange for the rather ridiculous commitment of practically all of your time. There already is something better on planet Earth than women: videogames, the internet.

A nigh obnoxious amount of mental energy, insight and creativity was required to establish the paradigm of internet pornography, you can enjoy it for 15 minutes a day to satisfy your primal urges, and then you're done.

Art/entertainment is practically a concentrated form of man's soul, with the explicit goal of being superior to "reality", maximizing value faster and more efficiently than say... taking a walk in nature. It's only less fun if you surrender to the anxiety that you're a "loser", perpetuated by... cultural brainwashing, absorbing ideas and notions without considering them objectively. If you wanted to maximize "fun", you would fix your mind and play videogames (and enjoy other concentrated, super-value peaks of effort only available in a civilized society with specialization, division of labor). If you wanted to maximize "meaning", you'd either opt to maximize "fun", or you'd opt to solve the whole dying problem, because living for a thousand years is actually more meaningful than living to 80 and dying surrounded by your loved ones, contrary to whatever rationalizations you hear for why having your soul permanently annihilated is totally a good thing and it sure would suck if we all were immortal.

All the fruits of eons of civilization, such massive, concentrated value, and you're going to throw it away by surrendering to your primal urges, without even really considering whether you should, as if it's just the default, obvious thing to do? You might not be able to choose whether you're born anysexual, but you can choose to not act upon it. You can certainly avoid getting married and having kids.

There's a genuine potential for us to make things that are way better than the internet, videogames, if... if we don't waste all of our time and energy on playing savages. There is so much more to the world than getting married and having children, the small happiness you might gain from it is not worth so much of your time and effort. The fruits of civilization started outweighing the fruits of evolution (sex, and so on) decades if not centuries ago. Update your preferences, ideals, to something that is more compatible with the modern age, something that terminates in more value than whatever ideals were reasonable in the Stone Age.
